definition: oath/pledge/union/to ally/league, a subdivision corresponding to prefecture in Inner Mongolia

sentences.english: I have been fascinated by some of the statistics that have been amassed by some of the major leaguers .
sentences.chinese: 我一直嚮往的一些統計數字已經積累了一些重要盟員。

sentences.english: One of the main problems in AM is how to select partners.
sentences.chinese: 敏捷製造企業要解決的主要問題是如何選擇盟員。
